author: John
title: Daily Afternoon Randomness (49 Photos)
text:
Advertisement 6 
It’s that time of year again! Ever wanted to spend a weekend of golf, charity, and debauchery with Bill Murray and theCHIVE? 
This year, we have created a contest that makes last years look like an East Coast clambake. The Murray Bros. Caddyshack Charity golf tournament returns March 23nd-24rd and we want you to join us! 
Everybody who donates $10 qualifies to win a chance for an all expenses paid (flight, airfare, everything) vacation for you and THREE of your best friends to join theCHIVE and Bill Murray in St. Augustine for an event that will leave you smiling for years. You and your friends will also play in the tournament! 
Enter by clicking on ‘Donate $10’ here ! 7 
This is your chance to achieve hero status with your friends. Every $10 you donate increases your chance of winning the trip of a lifetime. Trust me, the view is incredible. 
All proceeds to go charity and you can enter RIGHT HERE ! 
Good luck!
